title: ‘More Problematic Than Ever’: Ketones Still Causing Consternation in Absense of UCI Position
content:
'Clean cycling' group lashes out at UCI for failure to stamp authority on long-lingering ketone debate, but that's not stopping most of the peloton from slurping the divisive supplement.

Read the full article at ‘More Problematic Than Ever’: Ketones Still Causing Consternation in Absense of UCI Position on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
